meanings: (떳떳이) fairly, squarely, grandly, (용기 있게) bravely, boldly, (자신을 가지고) confidently, proudly

vlive.korean: 딱 카메라 앞에 당당히! - 형... 형처럼... In front of the camera! - Like you... 듣기 View video Stray Kids : 막내의 사생활 22 🦊🐿(다시)
vlive.english: In front of the camera! - Like you...

vlive.korean: 쉽게 포기할 거 아니면 더 당당히 마주하는 게 좋지 않을까? If you're not going to give up easily, isn't it a better idea to look her in the face? 듣기 View video 렛스튜디오 (LETstudio) : [겨울방학] Ep03 썸과 어색의 사이
vlive.english: If you're not going to give up easily, isn't it a better idea to look her in the face?

vlive.korean: 당당히 이름표에 1등! [It says 1st place on your name tag! 듣기 View video Mnet : 프로듀스101 시즌2 8화
vlive.english: [It says 1st place on your name tag!

vlive.korean: 두개의 나의 발로 당당히 걸어~ Walk proudly with two feet~ 듣기 View video BTOB : 비투비 - 비트콤 #47 (크루즈 프로모션 비하인드)
아니야 여러분 일단 당당히 들어가요 나이가 맞다면. No, you should confidently go in if you're of the right age. 듣기 View video V PICK! : [SF9] 감자탕집에서 백초딩(11살, 미래의 SF9 래퍼)에게 일어난 일🥔 (ZUHO talking about his childhood)
vlive.english: No, you should confidently go in if you're of the right age.

examples.korean: You have to stand up to those turkeys. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 넌 그 바보 녀석들과 당당히 맞서야 돼. Neungyule

examples.korean: She entered the hall with pomp and circumstance. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그녀는 위풍 당당히 강당에 입장했다. YBM All in All English-Korean Dictionary
